review: Too slow to watch movies. always buffering.
author: jimmy coombs

review: Purchased for a gift. Recipient loved it.
author: Millo

review: Wish I had bought one months earlier. Love the flexibility it gives me and the access to a wide variety of products it provides.
author: Reggie P.

review: It was better than I thought
author: James O. Edmond Jr.

review: I got this mainly for Netflix but so far it's poor quality. I can watch Netflix through the Xbox and not have a problem but with the fire stick every 2-3 minutes it's loading. That takes a lot of enjoyment out of watching a movie.
author: Jamie Wilson

review: Great product, I am really enjoying using it.
author: David R Hanna

review: This thing is amazing. Turned my dumb TV into a smart TV. Wonder if I could plug it into my ear and make me smart?
author: Gene W.

review: I absolutely love the Amazon Fire TV Stick. Previously, I received the goggle crome stick as a gift from my sister and it just was not that user friendly. The google stick was cumbersome to use but the Amazon fire stick does everything that I need it to do. It is amazing and I am so happy to have it.
author: Miami4Life
